Number of recruitment: 4 people

Job description:

- Manage and develop the customer system in the assigned area

- Approach, consult solutions to propose signing contracts with customers

- Take care and create sustainable cooperation relationships with customers

- Maintain customer relationships; established a sales system and well implemented business in the region

Requirements:

- Gender: Male

- Graduated high school / college / university major in Veterinary Medicine / Animal husbandry / fisheries

- Having sales experience of 01 year or more

- Communicate and present effectively

- Building sustainable cooperation relationships with customers

- Negotiate and solve problems well

- Ability to work independently, in groups

Benefits:

- Income from 10 to 30 million / month

- Enjoy all the benefits of social insurance, YT, TN, public holidays, New Year in accordance with the current law.

- The company participates in unemployment insurance 24/24

- Join and enjoy the rights of a union.

Profile request:

- Job application, certificate of conduct, health certificate (within 6 months).

- Identity card, household registration book (copy).

- Relevant diplomas and certificates.

Contact:

- Apply directly at the company.

- Candidates applying by email please scan diplomas, certificates, transcripts, CV and relevant documents sent to the Company Email: tuyendung@cailayvetco.com
